questions.answer:
The volume \( V \) of a cuboid is given by the formula: 
\[ 
V = \text{length} \times \text{width} \times \text{height} 
\] 
From the given dimensions: 
- Length \( AB = 7 \text{cm} \) 
- Width \( AF = 5 \text{cm} \) 
- Height \( FC = 15 \text{cm} \) 

Substitute the values into the formula: 
\[ 
V = 7 \text{cm} \times 5 \text{cm} \times 15 \text{cm} 
\] 
\[ 
V = 525 \text{cm}^3 
\] 

The volume of the cuboid is \( 525 \text{cm}^3 \). 

\textbf{Answer:} \( 525 \text{cm}^3 \)
questions.question_description: Find the volume of Cuboid ABCDEFGH
